name: Dutchess Capital
overview: Dutchess Capital is the investment manager for funds which provide flexible financing solutions for growth-stage and mature public companies alike. Founded in 2000, funds managed by Dutchess have made direct investments in companies which span a wide array of sectors including; Healthcare, Biotechnology, Natural Resources, Telecom, Wireless Communication, Internet, e-Commerce, Technology, Media, Defense, Homeland Security, Financial Services, Entertainment, Nuclear Sciences, Manufacturing, Apparel, Textiles, Consumer Products and Alternative Energy. For over ten years, we have successfully utilized various investment structures including Equity Line Facilities, Equity Linked Notes and Direct Placements. With offices in Boston, New York, London and Beijing, Dutchess has assisted in facilitating the growth of companies worldwide.
